name: Hazel
headline: AI-enabled procurement software for government
description: Hazel sells AI-powered procurement software to the 19,000+ local, state, and federal government entities which procure $2.7T a year. We use AI to write solicitations 10x faster and find 10x as many vendors, saving time and money

founders.name: August Chen, Founder
founders.description:
@Palantir, I built wildfire prevention apps that led to a 99% reduction in acres impacted by wildfires in CA. I also developed several channel partnerships from 0 ->1, securing $Xmm in high-margin licenses.

MechE/CS @ Harvard '20. Led MakeHarvard. My thesis was on how we can safely deploy aerosols into the stratosphere to save Earth (see: geoengineering).

founders.name: Elton Lossner, Founder
founders.description:
Originally from Atlanta, Elton graduated with a bachelor's in Electrical Engineering from Harvard, where he cofounded MakeHarvard and wrote an AI/ML thesis in medtech. He interned in data engineering for Capital One and aerospace engineering for a space startup.

He spent ~5 years at BCG, exiting as Project Leader. He built *lots* of slides and led strategy and procurement cases in the Aerospace & Defense and Public Sector practice areas. He lives in Boston with his wife.

generated_description:
### Overview of Hazel

**Name:** Hazel  
**Founded:** 2024  
**Location:** New York  
**Team Size:** 5 employees  
**Backed by:** Y Combinator (Batch W24)  
**Website:** [hazelai.com](https://hazelai.com)  

### Mission

Hazel's mission is to revolutionize government procurement with AI-enabled software, serving over 19,000 federal, state, and local government entities that collectively spend approximately $2.7 trillion annually. The platform aims to accelerate the procurement process, enabling government agencies to generate solicitations ten times faster and discover ten times as many vendors, ultimately saving time and money.

### Key Features

- **AI-Powered Solicitation:** Users can leverage Hazel’s AI tools to draft solicitations efficiently by utilizing reference documents and similar contracts.
  
- **Vendor Discovery:** Automatically identify suitable local vendors based on solicitation requirements through extensive databases of verified supplier information.
  
- **Performance Monitoring:** Track vendor performance, submit user surveys, and gather insights for better supplier management.
  
- **Diversity Support:** Facilitate outreach to diverse vendors, ensuring compliance with diversity mandates in public procurement.
  
- **Compliance Assurance:** Automate checks to ensure that solicitations adhere to best practices and compliance standards.

### Team 

The Hazel team blends expertise in government and technology, with co-founders August S. Chen (CEO) and Elton G. Lossner (COO) leading a capable group of engineers. Their backgrounds include work at renowned organizations like Palantir and Lockheed Martin, bringing a wealth of experience in delivering mission-critical solutions for government agencies.

### Future Focus

Hazel is committed to upholding the highest standards of integrity, transparency, and security in its AI solutions, with a keen focus on public interest. By being a part of the GovAICoalition vendor registry and prioritizing U.S. based methodologies, Hazel ensures that its tools are built for the unique challenges faced by government entities.

For anyone involved in government procurement looking to upgrade their processes with AI, Hazel seems poised to be a transformative partner. If you're intrigued, don’t hesitate to visit their [website for a demo](https://hazelai.com/#contact-us) and explore how they can help enhance your procurement strategies.
